creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: bald figure with fierce, scowling face, gripping sword in PL hand stepping out of a door onto wooden balcony to confront three large, grotesque skulls hovering at L edge
marks: Right edge: [ 明治十年？？　容齋？士 ]
medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk
title: Taira Kiyomori Seeing Skulls
